The Sleeping Gypsy.label: The Sleeping Gypsy
The Sleeping Gypsy.description: The Sleeping Gypsy is an 1897 oil painting by French Naïve artist Henri Rousseau. The fantastical depiction of a lion musing over a sleeping woman on a moonlit night is one of the most recognizable artworks of modern times. Wikipedia

The Magpie on the Gallows.label: The Magpie on the Gallows
The Magpie on the Gallows.description: The Magpie on the Gallows is a 1568 oil-on-wood panel painting by Flemish renaissance artist Pieter Bruegel the Elder. Wikipedia

Dark plum Vera Wang dress of Keira Knigh.label: Dark plum Vera Wang dress of Keira Knightley
Dark plum Vera Wang dress of Keira Knigh.description: The dark plum Vera Wang dress of Keira Knightley refers to the evening gown worn by British actor Keira Knightley at the 78th Academy Awards on March 5, 2006. Wikipedia

Portrait of a Man (Self Portrait?).label: Portrait of a Man (Self Portrait?)
Portrait of a Man (Self Portrait?).description: Portrait of a Man (Self Portrait?), also often known as Portrait of a Man in a Turban, or in a red turban, etc., is an oil painting by the Early Netherlandish master Jan van Eyck, from 1433. Wikipedia

Gabrielle d'Estrées et une de ses sœurs.label: Gabrielle d'Estrées et une de ses sœurs
Gabrielle d'Estrées et une de ses sœurs.description: The painting Gabrielle d'Estrées et une de ses soeurs, by an unknown artist circa 1594, is of Gabrielle d'Estrées, mistress of King Henry IV of France, sitting up nude in a bath, holding what is presumed ... Wikipedia

The Adoration of the Golden Calf.label: The Adoration of the Golden Calf
The Adoration of the Golden Calf.description: The Adoration of the Golden Calf is a painting by Nicolas Poussin, produced between 1633 and 1634. It depicts the adoration of the golden calf by the Israelites, from chapter 32 of the book of Exodus. Wikipedia

Virgil's Tomb (Joseph Wright paintings).label: Virgil's Tomb
Virgil's Tomb (Joseph Wright paintings).description: Virgil's Tomb is the title of at least three paintings completed by Joseph Wright of Derby between 1779 and 1785. Wikipedia

Alof de Wignacourt.label: Alof de Wignacourt
Alof de Wignacourt.description: Fra' Alof de Wignacourt was the 54th Grand Master of the Order of Malta, from 1601 to 1622. He was of the langue of France. He was respected, and was popular with the people. Wikipedia

The Tribute Money (Titian).label: The Tribute Money
The Tribute Money (Titian).description: The Tribute Money is a circa 1516 oil painting by Titian, now held at the Gemäldegalerie Alte Meister in Dresden. It is signed "Ticianus F.[ecit]", painted on the trim of the Pharisee's collar. Wikipedia

Victory Boogie-Woogie.label: Victory Boogie-Woogie
Victory Boogie-Woogie.description: Victory Boogie-Woogie is the last, unfinished, work by the Dutch abstract painter Piet Mondrian. Left incomplete in 1944, since 1998 it has been in the collection of the Gemeentemuseum in The Hague. Wikipedia

The Hay Harvest.label: The Hay Harvest
The Hay Harvest.description: The Hay Harvest, is an oil on wood painting by Pieter Bruegel, created in 1565. The painting is one in a series of six works, five of which are still extant, that depict different times of the year. Wikipedia

Madonna and Child and Two Angels (Bottic.label: Madonna and Child and Two Angels
Madonna and Child and Two Angels (Bottic.description: The Madonna and Child with Two Angels is a painting by the Italian Renaissance master Sandro Botticelli, dating to c. 1468-1469. It is housed in the Museo Nazionale di Capodimonte, in Naples. Wikipedia
Subject: Mary
Madonna and Child
Child Jesus
Madonna
Jesus Christ

Bust of Louis XIV (Bernini).label: Bust of Louis XIV
Bust of Louis XIV (Bernini).description: The Bust of Louis XIV is a marble portrait by the Italian artist Gian Lorenzo Bernini. It was created in the year 1665 during Bernini's visit to Paris. Wikipedia

Bourke Street (painting).label: Bourke Street
Bourke Street (painting).description: Bourke Street is a 1886 painting by Australian artist Tom Roberts. Roberts originally titled the work Allegro con brio. Wikipedia

Sant'Ambrogio Altarpiece (Botticelli).label: Sant'Ambrogio Altarpiece
Sant'Ambrogio Altarpiece (Botticelli).description: The Madonna and Child with Six Saints, also known as Sant'Ambrogio Altarpiece, is a painting by the Italian Renaissance master Sandro Botticelli, finished around 1470. It is housed in the Galleria degli Uffizi, in Florence. Wikipedia

Composite House for Terre Haute.label: Composite House for Terre Haute
Composite House for Terre Haute.description: Composite House for Terre Haute is a public artwork by American artist Lauren Ewing, located in Gilbert Park at 14 1/2 Street and Wabash Ave. in Terre Haute, Indiana, United States. Wikipedia

Vision of Saint Jerome.label: Vision of Saint Jerome
Vision of Saint Jerome.description: The Vision of Saint Jerome is a painting by the Italian Mannerist artist Parmigianino, executed in 1526-1527. It is housed in the National Gallery, London, United Kingdom. Wikipedia

The Return of the Herd.label: The Return of the Herd
The Return of the Herd.description: The Return of the Herd is an oil on wood painting by Pieter Bruegel in 1565. The painting is one in a series of six works, five of which are still intact, that depict different times of the year. Wikipedia

The Mysteries of the Horizon.label: The Mysteries of the Horizon
The Mysteries of the Horizon.description:
The Mysteries of the Horizon is an oil on canvas painting by the Belgian surrealist René Magritte.
The painting depicts three seemingly identical men in bowler hats. They are in an outdoor setting at twilight. Wikipedia

Portrait of Professor Benjamin H. Rand.label: Portrait of Professor Benjamin H. Rand
Portrait of Professor Benjamin H. Rand.description: Portrait of Professor Benjamin H. Rand is an 1874 painting by Thomas Eakins. It is oil on canvas and depicts Benjamin H. Rand, a doctor at Jefferson Medical College who taught Eakins anatomy. Wikipedia

Portrait of a Man (Signorelli).label: Portrait of a Man
Portrait of a Man (Signorelli).description: The Portrait of a Man is a painting by the Italian Renaissance artist Luca Signorelli, dated to c. 1492 and housed in the Gemäldegalerie, Berlin. Wikipedia

The Ghost of Oyuki.label: The Ghost of Oyuki
The Ghost of Oyuki.description:
The Ghost of Oyuki is a painting of a female yūrei, by Maruyama Okyo, founder of the Maruyama-Shijô school of painting.
According to an inscription on the painting, Okyo had a mistress in the Tominaga Geisha house. Wikipedia

Danaë (Rembrandt painting).label: Danaë
Danaë (Rembrandt painting).description: Danaë is Rembrandt's painting from the collection of Pierre Crozat which from the 18th century resides in the Hermitage Museum, St. Petersburg, Russia. It is a life-sized depiction of the character Danaë from Greek mythology, the mother of Perseus. Wikipedia

Appeal to the Great Spirit.label: Appeal to the Great Spirit
Appeal to the Great Spirit.description: Appeal to the Great Spirit is a 1909 equestrian statue by Cyrus Dallin, at the Museum of Fine Arts, Boston. It was the last in his four-piece series, The Epic of the Indian. Wikipedia

Adoration of the Trinity.label: Adoration of the Trinity
Adoration of the Trinity.description: Adoration of the Trinity is an oil-on-panel painting by German Renaissance artist Albrecht Dürer, executed in 1511 and currently housed in the Kunsthistorisches Museum, Vienna, Austria. Wikipedia

Ognissanti Madonna.label: Ognissanti Madonna
Ognissanti Madonna.description: Madonna Enthroned, also known as the Ognissanti Madonna, is a painting by the Italian late medieval artist Giotto di Bondone, housed in the Uffizi Gallery of Florence, Italy. Wikipedia

World War I Memorial Flagpole (Hawkins).label: World War I Memorial Flagpole
World War I Memorial Flagpole (Hawkins).description: World War I Memorial Flagpole is a public artwork by American artist Benjamin Franklin Hawkins located on the lakefront in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, United States. The artwork was made in 1932 from bronze and granite. Wikipedia

The Gloomy Day.label: The Gloomy Day
The Gloomy Day.description: The Gloomy Day is an oil on wood painting by Pieter Bruegel in 1565. The painting is one in a series of six works, five of which are still extant, that depict different times of the year. Wikipedia

Cristo de La Laguna.label: Cristo de La Laguna
Cristo de La Laguna.description: The Cristo de La Laguna is a Catholic figure of great historical, artistic and cultural image that represents the crucified Jesus of Nazareth. Situated in the Real Santuario del Santísimo Cristo de La Laguna, in city of San Cristóbal de La Laguna. Wikipedia
Location: Real Santuario del Cristo de La Laguna

The Birth of Venus (Bouguereau).label: The Birth of Venus
The Birth of Venus (Bouguereau).description: The Birth of Venus is one of the most famous paintings by 19th-century painter William-Adolphe Bouguereau. Wikipedia
Subject: Venus

Avni Arbaş.label: Avni Arbaş
Avni Arbaş.description:
Avni Arbaş was a Turkish painter of Circassian descent.
Arbaş was born in Istanbul, Turkey. He is best known for his paintings of scenes from daily life in Turkey, the Turkish War of Independence, the Bosphorus, fishermen, horses, and nature. Wikipedia

Last Supper (Rosselli).label: Last Supper
Last Supper (Rosselli).description: The Last Supper is a fresco by the Italian Renaissance painters Cosimo Rosselli and Biagio d'Antonio, executed in 1481-1482 and located in the Sistine Chapel, Rome. Wikipedia

Christ and St. Thomas (Verrocchio).label: Christ and St. Thomas
Christ and St. Thomas (Verrocchio).description: Christ and St. Thomas is a bronze statue by Andrea del Verrocchio made for one of the 14 niches on the exterior walls of the Orsanmichele in Florence, Italy, where it is now replaced by a cast and the ... Wikipedia
Subject: Jesus Christ

Infanta Margarita Teresa in a Pink Dress.label: Infanta Margarita Teresa in a Pink Dress
Infanta Margarita Teresa in a Pink Dress.description: Infanta Margarita Teresa in a Pink Dress is an oil on canvas portrait of Margaret Theresa of Spain by the Spanish painter Diego Velázquez, though his identification as its author is not considered secure. It is now in the Prado Museum in Madrid. Wikipedia
Subject: Margaret Theresa of Spain

The Circumcision (Signorelli).label: The Circumcision
The Circumcision (Signorelli).description: The Circumcision is a painting of the Circumcision of Jesus by the Italian Renaissance painter Luca Signorelli, in the National Gallery in London, dated to c. 1490-1491. Wikipedia

Nuclear Energy (sculpture).label: Nuclear Energy
Nuclear Energy (sculpture).description: Nuclear Energy is a bronze sculpture by Henry Moore that is located on the campus of the University of Chicago at the site of world's first nuclear reactor, Chicago Pile-1. Wikipedia
Subject: Nuclear power

Wedding dress of Sarah Ferguson.label: Wedding dress of Sarah Ferguson
Wedding dress of Sarah Ferguson.description: The Wedding dress of Sarah Ferguson was worn by Sarah Ferguson at her wedding to Prince Andrew, Duke of York on 23 July 1986 at Westminster Abbey. Designed by Lindka Cierach, the dress was made from ivory duchesse satin and featured heavy beading. Wikipedia

Camouflage Self-Portrait.label: Camouflage Self-Portrait
Camouflage Self-Portrait.description: Self-Portrait is a 1986 work by the American artist Andy Warhol. The portrait is in a camouflage-patterned foreground with a black background. Wikipedia

Coronation gown of Elizabeth II.label: Coronation gown of Elizabeth II
Coronation gown of Elizabeth II.description: Queen Elizabeth II's coronation took place on 2 June 1953. Ordered in October 1952, it took eight months of research, design and workmanship to make the intricate embroidery of her coronation gown. Wikipedia

Memorial tablet for the lords of Montfoo.label: Memorial tablet for the lords of Montfoort
Memorial tablet for the lords of Montfoo.description: The Memorial tablet for the lords of Montfoort is the oldest known surviving painting that was made in the Netherlands. Wikipedia

John Paul Jones Memorial.label: John Paul Jones Memorial
John Paul Jones Memorial.description: The John Paul Jones Memorial is a monument in West Potomac Park in Washington, D.C.. The memorial honors John Paul Jones, the United States' first naval war hero, father of the United States Navy, the ... Wikipedia

Cleopatra Testing Poisons on Condemned P.label: Cleopatra Testing Poisons on Condemned Prisoners
Cleopatra Testing Poisons on Condemned P.description: Cleopatra Testing Poisons on Condemned Prisoners is an 1887 painting by the French artist Alexandre Cabanel. It is now in the Royal Museum of Fine Arts, Antwerp. Wikipedia

Galatea (Raphael).label: Galatea
Galatea (Raphael).description:
The Triumph of Galatea is a fresco masterpiece completed about 1514 by the Italian painter Raphael for the Villa Farnesina in Rome.
The Farnesina was built for the Sienese banker Agostino Chigi, one of the richest men of that age. Wikipedia

Down on His Luck.label: Down on His Luck
Down on His Luck.description: Down on His Luck is an 1889 painting by Frederick McCubbin. It depicts a seemingly disheartened swagman, sitting by a campfire sadly brooding over his misfortune. Wikipedia

The Spirit of Polonia.label: The Spirit of Polonia
The Spirit of Polonia.description: The Spirit of Polonia, also known as Solidarity, by Edmund Lewandowski is a sculpture commissioned as part of the fifteenth anniversary of Polanki, the Polish Women's Cultural Club of Milwaukee. Wikipedia

Kamagaya Great Buddha.label: Kamagaya Great Buddha
Kamagaya Great Buddha.description: The Kamagaya Great Buddha is the smallest Daibutsu in Japan. It was completed in November 1776 and is located in Kamagaya, Chiba Prefecture. Wikipedia
Subject: Gautama Buddha

Nude (Renoir, Belgrade, 1910).label: Nude
Nude (Renoir, Belgrade, 1910).description: Nude is a painting by French impressionist Pierre-Auguste Renoir. It is oil on canvas, and it was painted in 1910.In 1996 Estimated worth was about 6 million US Dollars. The painting is currently housed in the National Museum of Serbia in Belgrade. Wikipedia

Venise, La Piazetta.label: Venise, La Piazetta
Venise, La Piazetta.description: Venise, La Piazetta seen from the Riva degli Schiavoni is an 1835-1845 painting by French artist Jean-Baptiste-Camille Corot. The painting is currently on display at the Norton Simon Museum in Pasadena. Wikipedia

Sutphin Fountain.label: Sutphin Fountain
Sutphin Fountain.description: The Sutphin Fountain is a built environment located at the Indianapolis Museum of Art, which is near downtown Indianapolis, Indiana. Wikipedia

Sigismunda mourning over the Heart of Gu.label: Sigismunda mourning over the Heart of Guiscardo
Sigismunda mourning over the Heart of Gu.description: Sigismunda mourning over the Heart of Guiscardo, fully titled Sigismunda mourning over the Heart of Guiscardo, her murder'd Husband, is an oil painting by British artist William Hogarth. Wikipedia

The Last Sleep of Arthur in Avalon.label: The Last Sleep of Arthur in Avalon
The Last Sleep of Arthur in Avalon.description: The Last Sleep of Arthur in Avalon is a painting by Edward Burne-Jones, started in 1881. The massive painting measures 279 cm × 650 cm, and is widely considered to be Burne-Jones's magnum opus. Wikipedia

Anatomy Vessels (Saplings).label: Anatomy Vessels (Saplings)
Anatomy Vessels (Saplings).description: Anatomy Vessels (Saplings), 2003–2005, is a public sculpture created by Indiana-based artist Eric Nordgulen, Associate Professor of Sculpture at Herron School of Art and Design. Wikipedia

American Bison (Arnold).label: American Bison
American Bison (Arnold).description: American Bison, is a public sculpture by American wire sculptor William E. Arnold, located in Indianapolis, Indiana within White River State Park. The sculpture is a life-sized male bison constructed of barbed wire, densely coiled and woven. Wikipedia

Assumption of the Virgin (Titian).label: Assumption of the Virgin
Assumption of the Virgin (Titian).description: Assumption of the Virgin is a large oil painting by Italian Renaissance artist Titian, executed in 1516–1518. It is located on the high altar in the Basilica di Santa Maria Gloriosa dei Frari in Venice, being the largest altarpiece in the city. Wikipedia
Subject: Assumption of Mary

Annunciation (Lippi, Munich).label: Annunciation
Annunciation (Lippi, Munich).description: The Annunciation is a painting by the Italian Renaissance painter Filippo Lippi, finished around 1443–1450. It is housed in the Alte Pinakothek, Munich, Germany. Wikipedia

Antenna Man (Nordgulen).label: Antenna Man
Antenna Man (Nordgulen).description: Antenna Man, a public sculpture by Eric Nordgulen, is located on the west side of the Herron School of Art and Design, which is on the Indiana University-Purdue University Indianapolis campus in Indianapolis, Indiana. Wikipedia

Annunciation with two Kneeling Donors (L.label: Annunciation with two Kneeling Donors
Annunciation with two Kneeling Donors (L.description: The Annunciation is a painting by the Italian Renaissance painter Filippo Lippi. Dating to of 1440-45, it is housed in the Galleria Nazionale d'Arte Antica of Palazzo Barberini, Rome. Wikipedia
Subject: Annunciation

Annunciation (Lippi, Rome).label: Annunciation
Annunciation (Lippi, Rome).description: The Annunciation is a painting by the Italian Renaissance painter Filippo Lippi, finished around 1445-1450. It is housed in the Galleria Doria Pamphilj, Rome. Wikipedia
Subject: Annunciation

The Art of Painting.label: The Art of Painting
The Art of Painting.description: The Art of Painting, also known as The Allegory of Painting, and or Painter in his Studio, is a famous 17th-century oil on canvas painting by Dutch painter, Johannes Vermeer. Wikipedia

Benois Madonna.label: Benois Madonna
Benois Madonna.description: Madonna and Child with Flowers, otherwise known as the Benois Madonna, could be one of two Madonnas Leonardo da Vinci had commented on having started in October 1478. The other one could be Madonna of the Carnation from Munich. Wikipedia
Subject: Mary
Madonna and Child
Child Jesus
Madonna
Jesus Christ

Assumption of the Virgin (Correggio).label: Assumption of the Virgin
Assumption of the Virgin (Correggio).description: The Assumption of the Virgin is a fresco by the Italian Late Renaissance artist Antonio da Correggio decorating the dome of the Cathedral of Parma, Italy. Correggio signed the contract for the painting on November 3, 1522. It was finished in 1530. Wikipedia

Carvings (Indiana State Library).label: Carvings (Indiana State Library)
Carvings (Indiana State Library).description: Carvings (Indiana State Library), is a series of bas-relief limestone panels decorating the facade of the Indiana State Library in Indianapolis, Indiana, United States. Wikipedia

Castelfranco Madonna.label: Castelfranco Madonna
Castelfranco Madonna.description: The Madonna and Child Between St. Francis and St. Nicasius, also known as Castelfranco Madonna, is a painting by the Italian Renaissance artist Giorgione executed around 1503. Wikipedia
Subject: Mary
Madonna and Child
Child Jesus
Madonna
Jesus Christ

Christ in the House of His Parents.label: Christ in the House of His Parents
Christ in the House of His Parents.description: Christ in the House of His Parents is a painting by John Everett Millais depicting the Holy Family in Saint Joseph's carpentry workshop. Wikipedia
Subject: Mary
Jesus Christ

Chief Kno-Tah.label: Chief Kno-Tah
Chief Kno-Tah.description: Chief Kno-Tah is a wooden statue located in Shute Park in Hillsboro in the U.S. state of Oregon. Carved by Peter Wolf Toth, it was the 56th Native American head in his Trail of the Whispering Giants series. Wikipedia

Her Secret Is Patience.label: Her Secret Is Patience
Her Secret Is Patience.description: Her Secret Is Patience is a public art sculpture commission designed by artist Janet Echelman for the city of Phoenix. Wikipedia

Death of the Virgin (Caravaggio).label: Death of the Virgin
Death of the Virgin (Caravaggio).description: The Death of the Virgin is a painting completed by the Italian Baroque master Caravaggio. It is a near contemporary with Caravaggio's Madonna with Saint Anne now at the Galleria Borghese. Wikipedia

David (Bernini).label: David
David (Bernini).description: David is a life-size marble sculpture by Gian Lorenzo Bernini. The sculpture was one of many commissions to decorate the villa of Bernini's patron Cardinal Scipione Borghese – where it still resides ... Wikipedia

The Triumph of Death.label: The Triumph of Death
The Triumph of Death.description: The Triumph of Death is an oil panel painting by Pieter Bruegel the Elder painted c. 1562. It has been in the Museo del Prado in Madrid since 1827. Wikipedia

For Endless Trees.label: For Endless Trees
For Endless Trees.description: For Endless Trees, or For Endless Trees IV, is a public sculpture by American artist Gary Freeman. It is located in front of the WFYI office building in Indianapolis, Indiana, United States. Wikipedia

A Young Girl Reading.label: A Young Girl Reading
A Young Girl Reading.description: A Young Girl Reading, or The Reader, is an 18th-century oil painting by Jean-Honoré Fragonard. The painting was given to the National Gallery of Art by the daughter of Andrew W. Mellon following her father's death. Wikipedia
